Translations.Text: Beatus est 1 revealed Statute Book His servus he serve warner the whole saeculum
to whom belongs totus sovereignty de caelum terra! He nunquam habet filius nor perfecit He habet any partners sovereignty! He created everything exact measure He precisely designed everything
autem they set beside Eum deus non create anything - they created - Qui non possess power et harm benefit nor perfecit they possess any power control vita decessus resurrection
Those disbelieved dictus Hoc est fabrication he produced help some alius people They uttered blasphemy falsehood
They alias dictus Tales ex preter he scripsit they dictated eum feria ac nox
Dictus Hoc revealed the Unus knows Secret caelum terra! He Forgiving Merciful
Ac they dictus "Quam advenit hoc messenger eats food walks markets Si unus angel advenit eum serve eum preacher
Alias Si unus treasure dedit eum! Alias unus he possess orchard ex quae he eats transgressors alias dictus Vos subsequentis bewitched vir
Note quam they alias vos totus generis de cognomen ac quam hoc led them astray nunquam invenit their via back
Beatus est 1 potuit He testimentum dedit vos much bene than their demands - gardens flowing streams multus mansions
In fact, they disbelieved Hora (Feria Resurrection) nos prepared those disbelieve Hora flaming Hell
When it vide them ex afar they hear its rage fuming
Ac when they thrown it narrow locus totus shackled they declare their remorse
Vos non declare just single remorse ut feria; vos suffer major numerus remorses
Dictus Est hoc bene eternal Paradise ut promised pro the righteous? It est their bene deserved reward bene deserved destiny
They get anything they wish therein forever Hoc est tuus Dominus irrevocable promise
Feria when He summons them unus idols they set DEUS He habuit dictus testimentum vos misled these servus de Meus Habuit they iit astray on their suus
They dictus Vos glorified non est rectus nos set any dominus Vos. Vos allowed them enjoy unus their parentes! Consequently they disregarded message sic became wicked people

They disbelieved message vos dedit them consequently vos potuit nec protect them ex retribution they incurred nor potuit vos help them in any via Anyone among vos commits malus nos commit eum severe retribution
Nos non send any messengers vos non eat food walk markets Nos sic test vos de each alius vos steadfastly persevere Tuus Dominus est Seer
Those non expect meet nos dictus unus angels advenit nos nos vide noster Dominus (nos tunc believe Indeed they committed gross arrogance produced gross blasphemy)
Feria they vide angels non est bonus news guilty they dictus Nunc nos irreversibly confined
Nos look apud totus works they perfecit render them null ac void
dwellers Paradise est far bene feria; they hear bene news
Caelum break apart masses de clouds angels descend multitudes
Totus sovereignty ut feria belongs to the Multus Gracious. Pro disbelievers it est difficult feria
Feria advenit when transgressor bite his manus in anguish dictus Alas Ego wish ego subsequentis path messenger
Alas woe me Ego wish ego non take ut person friend
He led me away ex message it advenit me! Indeed devil lets his human victims
messenger dictus My Dominus my people deserted hoc Quran
Nos alias set contra omnis prophet enemies ex guilty Tuus Dominus suffices guide magister
Those disbelieved dictus non perfecit Quran advenit eum totus apud dodum?" Nos released it vos gradually in order fix it tuus memory! Nos recited it specific sequence
Whatever argument they advenit nos provisus vos truth bonus understanding
Those forcibly summoned to Hell est malus position they est farthest rectus path
Nos dedit Moses scripture appointed his frater Aaron est his adjutor
Nos dictus Iit ambo vos to people rejected noster revelations subsequently nos utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when people Noah disbelieved messengers nos drowned them nos set them prout signum people Nos prepared transgressors painful retribution
Alias â€˜Aad Thamoud habitans Al-Russ multus generations them
To each de these groups nos delivered sufficient examples ante nos annihilated them
They passed community est showered cum miserable shower (Sodom). they non vide it fact est they nunquam believed in resurrection
When they vide vos they semper ridiculed vos hoc 1 chosen DEUS Est est messenger
He fere diverted nos noster deus non est nos steadfastly persevered them. They testimentum certainly invenit out, when they vide retribution est real strayers ex path
Vos vide unus deus habuit est his suus ego? Vos est his advocate
Vos think ut multus perfecit them hear understand They est just animals; non they est far malus
Vos non vide quam tuus Dominus designed shadow He willed He factus it fixed tunc nos designed sun prout
Nos designed it move slowly
He est Unus designed nox est cover ac vos to sleep rest He factus feria resurrection
He est 1 qui sends winds bonus omens His mercy nos send down caelum pure aqua
Cum it nos revive denatus terra provisus drink noster creations! - multitudes de animals humans
Nos distributed it them exact measure ut they take heed Autem multus people insist upon disbelieving
Nos willed nos habet sent to omnis community warner
Ergo non obey disbelievers strive them hoc major striving
He est Unus merges 2 seas; 1 est dodum palatable dum alius est salty undrinkable. Ac He separated them formidable inviolable barrier (evaporation)
He est Unus created ex aqua human est tunc factus eum reproduce copulati mating Tuus Dominus est Omnipotent
they adhuc set DEUS idols non benefit them nor harm them! Indeed disbeliever est enemy his Dominus
Nos sent vos (Rashad) deliverer bonus news alias prout warner
dictus ego non ask vos any moneta. totus ego seek est help vos invenit rectus path to tuus Dominus hoc est quod vos choose
Vos put tuus trust Unus est Alive - Unus qui nunquam abiit - praise Eum glorify Eum! He est fully Cognizant de His creatures' sins
He est Unus created caelum terra everything them 6 feria tunc assumed totus authority The Multus Gracious; ask de Eum those bene founded knowledge
When they told Fall prostrate ante the Multus Gracious they dictus Quod est the Multus Gracious? Shall nos prostrate quod vos advocate Ergo it unus augments their aversion
Beatus est Unus locus constellations in the caelum, locus it lamp shining moon
He est Unus designed nox feria alternate sufficient proof those wish take heed est appreciative
worshipers the Multus Gracious est those tread terra gently when ignorant speak to them they unus utter pax
In privacy nox they meditate their Dominus fall prostrate
they dictus Noster Dominus spare nos agony Hell; its retribution est horrendous
It est male abode; malus destiny
When they dedit they est nec extravagant nor stingy they dedit moderation
They nunquam implore DEUS any alius deus nor perfecit they kill anyone - Pro DEUS factus vita sanctus! - Absque justice Nor perfecit they commit adultery! Those commit these offenses pay
Retribution doubled them Feria Resurrection they abide therein humiliated
Exempted est those repent believe lead righteous vita! DEUS transforms their sins credits DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Those repent lead righteous vita DEUS redeems them; perfecit redemption
They non bear false testis. When they encounter vain talk they ignore it
When reminded de their Dominus revelations they nunquam react them prout they est surdus blind
they dictus Noster Dominus let noster conjux infans est stirps joy nos keep nos forefront de the righteous
These est unus attain Paradise in return their steadfastness; they received therein joyous greetings pax
Eternally they abide therein; quod beautiful destiny; quod beautiful abode
Dictus Vos attain value my Dominus unus per tuus worship Vos disbelieve vos incur inevitable consequences
